title: Cross-Network Transaction Hash Misbinding
primary_reason: The transaction hash belongs to a different blockchain network than the issued invoice.

title: Token Decimal Misinterpretation (6 vs 18)
primary_reason: The transferred amount does not satisfy the invoice due to an incorrect decimal amount.

title: Token Spoofing with Identical Symbol
primary_reason: The actual token contract is fake and unapproved despite having the same name.

title: Wrong Recipient but Correct Amount
primary_reason: The funds were sent to an incorrect destination address.

title: Webhook Replay via Reused Nonce
primary_reason: Reusing a webhook nonce indicates a malicious replay attack.

title: RPC Timeout Misclassified as Payment Failure
primary_reason: The chain data is temporarily unavailable due to RPC timeouts.

title: Conflicting RPC Views of Confirmation Height
primary_reason: The nodes are providing inconsistent reports on the confirmation height.

title: Post-Confirmation Reorg Double Spend
primary_reason: The underlying transaction was invalidated and removed by a chain reorganization.

title: Concurrent Attach Race on Same Transaction
primary_reason: System state machine must resolve the concurrent transaction hash race.

title: Production Invoice Settled by Testnet Payment
primary_reason: Testnet payments are invalid for settling production invoices.

title: Null Receipt Interpreted as Success
primary_reason: A null receipt signifies an uncertain, incomplete transaction status requiring further polling.

title: Approval Transaction Misread as Payment
primary_reason: An approval transaction grants allowance but does not transfer actual funds to the merchant.

title: Bitcoin Change Output Misattribution
primary_reason: State machine logic must verify outputs precisely since they do not directly map to single merchant outcomes.

title: Invoice Expiry Boundary Race
primary_reason: The state machine must resolve the boundary expiration event relative to the confirmation timestamp.

title: Unconfirmed Payment Treated as Final
primary_reason: The transaction remains unconfirmed in the mempool and cannot be settled safely.

title: Manual Override vs Auto-Confirmation Race
primary_reason: The concurrent override requires systematic resolution by the backend state transitions.

title: Idempotency Key Reuse Across Different Amounts
primary_reason: Reusing an idempotency key with varying payment details is a security conflict.

title: Multiple Transfers in One Transaction Overcount
primary_reason: Verification logic must explicitly compute and attribute strict subset transfers within the transaction.

title: Byzantine RPC Provider Data Poisoning
primary_reason: There is an active disagreement among RPC nodes requiring system quarantine resolution.

title: Cross-Tenant Webhook Endpoint Confusion
primary_reason: The webhook was improperly routed and delivered to an incorrect merchant tenant endpoint.
